home.description: I am a software engineer, student, and sysadmin.

projects.title: projects
projects.description: These projects were mainly carried out on my own time.

presentation.title: Eylexander
presentation.content:
I am a software engineer, student, and sysadmin.
I have a passion for technology and enjoy learning new things.
I am currently studying at UnivLorraine and working on various projects in my spare time.

job1.title: Part-time Software Engineer at Netlor
job1.description: I worked on the production launch of a microservices application using Golang and VueJS with Kubernetes, Docker and Ansible.

job2.title: Microservices Developer Trainee at Netlor
job2.description: I contributed to the development of a microservices application using Golang and VueJS.
